column2: I  hold  that  an  interim  order  as  prayed  for  in  paragraph  (f)  of the

column1: prayer to the petition be issued subject to the following variation.

column2: The  Court  is  mindful  of the  fact  that  the  franchise  of the  people

column1: should  be  protected.  Therefore  the  Court  does  not  intend  to

column2: interim order until the final  determination of this case.  The  interim order

column1: is  issued until the  next day  of hearing  to  enable  the  Court to  re  asses  the
necessity of extending the interim order.

column2: Issue  interim  order as  prayed for  in the paragraph (f)  of the prayer

column1: to the petition to be operative until the next day of hearing.

column2: President of the Court of Appeal
